"The Beckoning Darkness":
"A powerful Darker reading has been
detected in the corrupted Mothership.
From the strength of the reading, we
can only conclude that a Dark Falz, or
a similarly powerful being, has appeared.
In addition, the energy levels in each
area are reading as abnormally high.
Proceed with caution.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Fail mission goals, time limit expires"
